name: get_info_from_vin
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vin_recognition_decoder.
Tool description: This API extract vin from a ID cards, labels, receipts, invoices, documents, barcodes, etc and returns the information such as the manufacturer, model, year, country of origin and much more.. 
API description: This endpoint returns the information of a vin such as country of origin, model, year, model, car seats, etc.

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number to decode.
